h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: The most important thing to note is that the mud hinders your ability to dodge, but it does **not** slow your ability to sprint. This means there are several situations and attacks where it can be preferable to run instead of waiting for a last second evade, so try to remember that option during this fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)', specifically from the subsection 'Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
The most important thing to note is that the mud hinders your ability to dodge, but it does **not** slow your ability to sprint. This means there are several situations and attacks where it can be preferable to run instead of waiting for a last second evade, so try to remember that option during this fight.
